products.title: Splash Dove Grey Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Dove Grey Panel Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Dove Grey panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The light grey panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0272 Fabric Colour: Dove Grey Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Cream Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Cream Panel Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Cream Panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window.  The light cream fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  At Swift Direct Blinds, like all our made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0248 Fabric Colour: Cream Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Oyster
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Oyster Standard Panel Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Panel Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: Wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: Robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: Top fix or face fix brackets.
